trans-unit.source: Provides services for XAML serialization by XAML designers or other callers that require advanced serialization.
trans-unit.target: Fornece serviços de serialização de XAML designers XAML ou outros chamadores que requerem serialização avançada.

trans-unit.source: The XamlDesignerSerializationManager attempts to optimize access to services that are called frequently during the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: O XamlDesignerSerializationManager tenta otimizar o acesso aos serviços que são chamados com frequência durante o processo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: A XamlDesignerSerializationManager is also used as an input for certain specialized `ShouldSerialize` methods on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] classes such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.ShouldSerializeInlines%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and for an overload of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Um XamlDesignerSerializationManager também é usado como uma entrada especializadas para determinados `ShouldSerialize` métodos em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] classes como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.ShouldSerializeInlines%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e para uma sobrecarga de <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.ShouldSerializeInlines%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The XML writer implementation to use as basis for the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A implementação do gravador XML para usar como base para o <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XAML writer mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo de gravador XAML.

trans-unit.source: Not a valid member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriterMode"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Não é um membro válido do <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriterMode"> </xref> enumeração.
